description.value:
Trigger You are targetted by a Strike and you can see the attacker

Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

You attempt to masterfully deflect the triggering attack. Make a @Check[perception] check against a Level-based-DC of a level equal to the triggering creature's level. Regardless of the outcome, your blade is unsheathed and you end Iai Stance.

Critical Success You completely deflect the strike, causing it to deal minimum damage to you. You still take any effects the strike would deal.

Success You make the blow miss vital organs, granting you Resistance to the triggering damage equal to your level.

Failure You are barely able to alter the blow on you, only granting Resistance to the triggering damage equal to half your level and making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure You are unable to alter the course of this attack at all. You fail to deflect the blow and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} until the start of your next turn.
